text: Pentti Kalevi Karvonen (15 August 1931 â€“ 12 March 2022) was a Finnish steeplechase runner. He competed in the men's 3000 metres steeplechase at the 1960 Summer Olympics. Karvonen died on 12 March 2022, at the age of 90.Uusimaa: Yleisurheilun entinen ME-mies Pentti Karvonen on kuollut ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Finnish athletes Category:Olympians for Finland
